item.description:
Weather update as of 10 a.m. SATURDAY: [/crimson] The roads are clear and the Meetup is on! See you all soon!

Technique Workshop: Multicolored Zentangles!

Lori will be leading us in this month's workshop where we will be creating colored Zentangles! For those of you who enjoyed the black and white zentangles, you'll love the extension of the techniques into color. If you have colored sharpies, please bring them and we will have some to share. I'll have more paper for you to use in making your zentangles.

This technique will be used for the February swap.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: January 2011 NE ATC+ Monthly Meetup in Natick
